name: Kritz Cannon
description:
This is a basic prototype project that aims to explore a concept (that will most likely not continue further). You move with AD and SPACE and must shoot enemies to progress to the next room. You have a variety of tools including a gun, a shield and a double jump. The game is about obtaining and storing energy to use these abilities and deal extra damage.

WARNING: very beta, very short. Quitting mid-game will require an alt+f4

made with GM Studio 2
